title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit         Kayaking the Chattahoochee, one of many ways of exploring the park.   At Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area you can float, fish, or play in 48 miles of river as it flows through the northern suburbs of Atlanta. Use your land legs as you explore one of the 15 land units strung like emeralds along the river. Or just kick back and relax! These pages provide everything you need to begin your journey of exploration.
